imgDesc.text:
These tree vines have ensnared the scattered Khvarena. <color=#ffe14b>Sorush</color> can <color=#ffe14b>use her power</color> to extract this energy and channel it into the vines.
Some tree vines have been affected by <color=#ffe14b>Gray Crystals</color> , and require additional Khvarena energy for their snare to be loosened.
